DataElement.preferredName: Person Sufficient Hearing Speech Comprehension Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes No indicator to specify whether the patient can hear sufficiently to understand a conversation

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Sufficient Hearing Speech Comprehension Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._A human being._Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation._The auditory faculty, the perception of sound by the ear._An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result)._The exchange of spoken words.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.:The auditory faculty, the perception of sound by the ear.:The exchange of spoken words.:An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

Concepts.definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.
The auditory faculty, the perception of sound by the ear.
An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Able to hear sufficiently to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Able to hear sufficiently to understand a conversation determined by a simple test given at screening
